summary: A bioengineer with 6 years of research experience in  drug and gene delivery. Trained in development and characterization of biomaterials (hydrogel) ; small molecule drug and nucleic acid (pDNA, mRNA) delivery cargos with a specific emphasis on harnessing the immune system modulation/stimulation approach. Skilled in performing and troubleshooting molecular biology and imaging experiments  notably,  cytotoxicity , SDS-PAGE, western blot, ELISA, RT-qPCR, IF, IHC, flow cytometry, RNAseq (data analysis), SEM, confocal and fluorescence microscopy. Experienced in preclinical animal models including full thickness splinted mouse excisional wound model and mouse cancer xenograft model. Doctoral research was focused on designing an Antibody Drug Conjugate (ADC) system facilitating high therapeutic payload and improved tumor specificity. Postdoctoral research at ASU was focused on immunomodulatory therapeutic gene delivery for skin wound healing in diabetic mouse wound models. Currently, leading the R&D division as a Senior Scientist at Adipo Therapeutics aiming at clinical translation of a nanoparticle drug product formulation targeting obesity and type 2 diabetes.

currentPositions.description:
● Leading the scientific team to advance the drug product into phase I and phase II clinical trials
● Investigating the lead API loaded polymeric nanoparticle efficacy in adipose tissue browning 
● Screening the CMO manufactured nanoparticle formulations efficacy in in vitro, ex vivo and in vivo models
● Developed the methods for testing nanoparticle formulation efficacy on human ex vivo biopsy samples 
● Actively collaborating with the CROs, CMOs and academic institutions
currentPositions.title: Senior Formulations Scientist

educations.schoolName: Missouri University of Science and Technology
Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology

message.text: Great work by the leadership team. Glad to see the team stronger than ever and is continuing to grow. Exciting days ahead for Adipo Therapeutics !!

ingestedContentSummary.description: Adipo Therapeutics is a biotech company advancing the treatment of obesity by increasing energy expenditure through increasing metabolically beneficial brown fat using a 1st in class and novel MOA of Notch-inhibiting nanoparticles.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Adipo Therapeutics | Innovative Biotechnology | West Lafayette, IN

message.text:
Adipo Therapeutics is excited to announce the launch of our new website that  describes our mission, provides a scientific overview of our technology platform, highlights our management and advisory team members, and includes data and publications on brown adipose tissue and our lead candidate, ADPO-002NP.  To learn more about the novel 1st in class science of Adipo Therapeutics, please visit us at Adipotherapeutics.com
https://lnkd.in/g2dpA7kg
Where bold science meets an obesity epidemic.   Advancing the treatment of obesity by increasing energy expenditure through the unique benefits of brown fat.
